location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 8/96 MUSCAT STATE AFFAIRS: LANDING CONTRACT, MUSCAT.'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 5; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of a copy of an agreement made between the Wazir to the Sultan of Muscat and Oman and Messrs Khan Bahadur Nasib ibn Mohamad and Son, Muscat. The agreement grants the latter permission to land cargo from steamers for a period of two years.
